coach.initialMessage:
Hi! I'm your conversation coach. I've seen your priority profile - I know what matters to you. You can ask me things like:

• 'How should I bring up finances without being awkward?'
• 'He said his mother will always live with them - what should I think?'
• 'What should I ask in a follow-up meeting?'
• 'I had my meeting yesterday - can you help me evaluate how it went?'

What's on your mind?
